DOC.detailed_description: Despite high success rate , epidural technique remain rather blind technique , failure continue occur . The incidence reason failure well understood . The Tsui test routinely perform epidural catheter insertion , rather use suspicion catheter location . In study , Tsui test perform twice epidural procedure , bupivacaine consumption record first 2 hour . Information gain study could great impact clinical practice , since incidence inadequate labor analgesia still relatively high ( 10-20 % ) , lead maternal distress disappointing labor experience .
